StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: A single-cell and single-nucleus RNA-Seq toolbox for fresh and frozen human tumors

Person.Organization: MASSACHUSETTS INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGYBROAD INSTITUTE, INC.
BROAD INSTITUTE, INC.FRED HUTCHINSON CANCER RESEARCH CENTER

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: We thank all patients and their families. We thank the clinical research teams who supplied the samples, Ellen Todres Gelfand, Nichole Straub, Laura DelloStritto, Karla Helvie and Shreevidya Periyasamy for project management, Miraj Patel, Ana Lako, and Scott J. Rodig for pathology review, the scientific team at Leidos Biomedical Research, Inc., Frederick National Laboratory for Cancer Research, especially Rachana Agarwal and Yuriko Mori, and the team at NCI, especially Shannon Hughes, Philipp Oberdoerffer, and Dinah Singer. This project has been funded in part with Federal funds from the National Cancer Institute, National Institutes of Health, Task Order No. HHSN261100039 under Contract No. HHSN261201500003I. The content of this publication does not necessarily reflect the views or policies of the Department of Health and Human Services, nor does mention of trade names, commercial products, or organizations imply endorsement by the U.S. Government. This project was also funded in part by the “START: Standardization of Single-Cell and Single-Nucleus RNA-seq Protocols for Tumors” project from the Chan Zuckerberg Initiative and the Klarman Cell Observatory. AR is an Investigator of the Howard Hughes Medical Institute. CJW is a Scholar of the Leukemia and Lymphoma Society. JK was supported by an EMBO Long-Term Fellowship (ALTF 738-2017).

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Controlled-access (GSR are sensitive according to the Institutional Certification)

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical
ConsentGroup.name: HMB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Cancer, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CA-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Cancer. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use
ConsentGroup.name: GRU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification.
